content.rendered:
Embrace serenity along trails where wonders unfold.

Get Started

Lost in an island
unknown?

Let us handle your stay in Sri Lanka

A small island with vast to explore. From beautiful beaches and rolling tea hills to ancient temples and wildlife-filled national parks, there’s something for everyone. Enjoy the warm hospitality, taste delicious local food, and explore the rich culture and history.


Whether you’re here to relax, explore, or have an adventure, we Serene Trails promises memories of a lifetime.

Our Packages

What we offer...

From the moment you set foot in Sri Lanka, Serene Trails is here to take care of every detail. We’ll ensure you have the best experience the island has to offer.

Adventure

Looking for thrills? We’ve got you covered; rafting, zip-lining, climbing… you name it!

PickUp

On your first day, we’ll pick you up directly from the airport and take you to your accommodation.

Accomodations

We will arrange your accommodation throughout your stay in Sri Lanka, according to your needs.

Tour Plan

We’ll arrange your tour to match your interests, and take care of getting you around so you can focus on enjoying the experience.

A Glimpse of Sri Lanka

Sigiriya

Rising from the jungle like a giant stone flame, Sigiriya: the legendary Lion Rock guards the secrets of a vanished kingdom. Its painted maidens, hidden gardens, and sky high ruins whisper tales of power, beauty, and betrayal. Few places on earth blend mystery and majesty quite like this ancient fortress in the clouds.

Explore
